Instructions: Use the buttons in the top right to switch the input.
Algorithm: Parse the input and create objects for each input, output, chip, and bot.
Each frame, look for a bot that can either get a chip from an input, or has two chips and should act on it.
If no robot can act anymore, we reached the end finished. Answers are written to the console.
Display: Compute the size of the canvas based on number of inputs, outputs and bots.
Each bot action takes place in several steps: moving to the location, acting on the chip, moving back to original position.
